report.name: test1
report.sql: select SKU, 货品描述, 生产日期, 失效日期, 存储位, 存储位可用库存, 拣货位, 拣货位可用库存 from ( select t1.skucode SKU, t1.descrcn 货品描述, substr (t1.FIXCREATEDTIMEFORDISP, 1, 10) 生产日期, substr (t1.FIXEXPIREDTIMEFORDISP, 1, 10) 失效日期, t1.locationcode 存储位, t1.存储位可用库存, t2.locationcode 拣货位, t2.拣货位可用库存 from (select a.warehouse_id,a.customer_id, sku_id, c.skucode, c.descrcn, a.location_id, b.locationcode, FIXCREATEDTIMEFORDISP, FIXEXPIREDTIMEFORDISP, qtyuseuom as 存储位可用库存 from gv_inv_lotlocationuom a, gv_bas_location b, gv_bas_sku c where b.id = a.location_id and a.sku_id = c.id and qtyuseuom>0 and b.LOCATIONUSAGE_ID=139 and a.warehouse_id in (100544) and a.customer_id in (516824) ) t1, (select a.warehouse_id,a.customer_id, sku_id, c.skucode, c.descrcn, a.location_id, b.locationcode, qtyuseuom as 拣货位可用库存 from gv_inv_lotlocationuom a, gv_bas_location b, gv_bas_sku c where b.id = a.location_id and a.sku_id = c.id and b.LOCATIONUSAGE_ID=2588 and a.warehouse_id in (100544) and a.customer_id in (516824 ) order by sku_id ) t2 where t1.warehouse_id=t2.warehouse_id and t1.customer_id=t2.customer_id and t1.sku_id=t2.sku_id ) t -- order by SKU desc
